newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: CRICKET-SRI LANKA 144 FOR SIX AT TEA.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-SRI LANKA 144 FOR SIX AT TEA.

text.p: Sri Lanka, chasing New Zealand's first innings total of 222, were 144 for six wickets at tea on the second day of the second test on Saturday.
New Zealand 222 (B. Pocock 85, M. Muralitharan 3-43, N. Zoysa 3-47)
Sri Lanka 144 for six (R. Mahanama 45, H. Davis 3-46)
